message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

The paper proposes a method for human action recognition in videos using deep learning frameworks. This falls under computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.LG) sub-categories. The proposed method involves predicting the importance of each video frame, which can be seen as a form of attention mechanism, and thus could also be categorized under multimedia (cs.MM) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories. Finally, the paper evaluates its method on standard benchmarks, which involves comparing with state-of-the-art results, indicating information retrieval (cs.IR) sub-category.
